title: sap.fe.macros.microchart.MicroChart
content:
# sap.fe.macros.microchart.MicroChart

Building block used to create a MicroChart based on the metadata provided by OData V4.

Usually, a contextPath and metaPath is expected.
Usage example: 

sap.ui.require(["sap/fe/macros/microchart/MicroChart"], function(MicroChart) {
	 ...
	 new MicroChart("microChartID", {metaPath:"MyProperty"})
})

This is currently an experimental API because the structure of the generated content will change to come closer to the MicroChart that you get out of templates. The public method and property will not change but the internal structure will so be careful on your usage.

**Type:** class **Module:** sap/fe/macros/microchart/MicroChart ## Methods ### getContextPath

Gets current value of property contextPath.

### getHideOnNoData

Gets current value of property hideOnNoData.

### getMetaPath

Gets current value of property metaPath.

### getShowOnlyChart

Gets current value of property showOnlyChart.

### getSize

Gets current value of property size.

### setContextPath

Gets current value of property contextPath.

### setHideOnNoData

Gets current value of property hideOnNoData.

### setMetaPath

Gets current value of property metaPath.

### setShowOnlyChart

Gets current value of property showOnlyChart.

### setSize

Gets current value of property size.
